item.title: Yulianto add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "I think there should be a rule that everyone in the world should get a standing ovation at least once in their lives." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by J. Maarten Troost
item.description: "No one who claims this to be a small world has ever flown across the Pacific." -- J. Maarten Troost

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by J. Maarten Troost
item.description:
"Bwenawa brought my attention to two wooden planks raised about four feet above the ground. On the ledges were lagoon fish sliced open and lying in the sun, the carcasses just visible through an enveloping blizzard of flies. "You see, " said Bwenawa. "The water dries in the sun, leaving the salt. It's kang-kang [tasty]. We call it salt fish."
"Ah," I said. "In my country we call it rotten fish." -- J. Maarten Troost

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "No, I am not bitter, I am not hateful, and I am not unforgiving. I just don't like you." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "I was never a man of great ambition I cried too easily I didn't have a head for science Words often failed me While others prayed I only moved my lips" -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Katherine Applegate
item.description: "Memories are precious ... they help tell us who we are." -- Katherine Applegate

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Kate DiCamillo
item.description: "Open your heart. Someone will come. Someone will come for you. But first you must open your heart." -- Kate DiCamillo

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Katherine Applegate
item.description: "I like colorful tales with black beginnings and stormy middles and cloudless blue-sky endings. But any story will do." -- Katherine Applegate

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You've a good heart. Sometimes that's enough to see you safe wherever you go. But mostly, it's not." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Yulianto add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
